string.value: Power B. Fore has lost his precious letter of commendation. You'd better give him a hand at the training center.
He says he's sure the monsters at the training center are guilty of stealing his precious letter. He wants you to get it back.
You were able to retrieve Power B. Fore's precious letter of commendation and returned it to him.

Good! Then slay these monsters and find the letter of commendation. I'll keep looking for it around here, too.
If you're not going to help me, then stop bothering me!
Did you find it? Ohh, what a relief! Not bad for your first training session.\r\n#b#L0#This training session sounds like something you just randomly made up...#l\n#k

This letter should be kept spotless! The monsters stained my precious letter! Keep hunting them while I wipe the stains off my letter! My letter must be avenged! The training can't continue until then!
Hey, did you find it? I don't need a beginner like you slacking off on your first training session!
